Liquid from A moves horizontally and then meets a vertical baffle.

Liquid from C continues horizontally and meets a vertical baffle.

premise: Liquid from C continues horizontally and meets a vertical baffle.
conclusion: Liquid from C is directed downward into container F.

Liquid from D continues horizontally and meets a vertical baffle.

conclusion: Liquid from D is directed downward into container E.
